name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D LIVE CONCERT】J-RAP in JIGOKU! + NEW 3D MODEL REVEAL! #JRAPinJIGOKU [dN7gTC10XLE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope introduces a special collaboration with PES from RIP SLYME.
A video message from PES (RIP SLYME) about the collaboration on the new song 'FLASH BANG'.
Mori Calliope concludes the concert, mentioning the music video premiere and upcoming member's encore.

subtitles.original: in Japan, a member of RIP SLYME who helped popularize the entire J-Rap genre.
subtitles.english: in Japan, a member of RIP SLYME who helped popularize the entire J-Rap genre.

subtitles.original: RIP SLYMEのPESさんと一緒にコラボしました！
subtitles.english: I've collaborated with PES from RIP SLYME!

subtitles.original: やったー！パチパチパチパチ！
subtitles.english: Yay! *Clap clap clap clap!*

subtitles.original: もうすぐMVリリースしますよ！
subtitles.english: The MV will be released soon!

subtitles.original: We got a special message from him too, so let's run the clip!
subtitles.english: We got a special message from him too, so let's run the clip!

subtitles.original: はい。えー、Dead Beatsの皆さん、こんにちは。
subtitles.english: Hello, Dead Beats!

subtitles.original: PESと申します。どうも。
subtitles.english: I'm PES,

subtitles.original: えー、Calliopeさんの『Super Shooter』、いかがでしたでございましたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: What did you think of Calliope's "Super Shooter"?

subtitles.original: えー、この度、私PESがですね、Calliopeさんとコラボさせていただくことになりました。
subtitles.english: This time I, PES, had the chance to collaborate with Calliope!

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 私がね、プロデュースさせていただいた、Calliopeさんの新曲『FLASH BANG』がですね、
subtitles.english: I was able to produce Calliope's new song, "FLASH BANG",

subtitles.original: リリースされることになりました。よいしょー！
subtitles.english: which is being released now!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: えー、この曲はですね、あの、まあライブ皆さん楽しみにCalliopeさんのライブ見ていただいてると思うんですけど、
subtitles.english: So about this song, I think everyone is really enjoying watching Calliope's Live

subtitles.original: そのライブね、こう終わった後だって、いろんな普段の生活の中でもこうパッと、こう連れ戻されるような、
subtitles.english: and that Live, once it is over, during your normal everyday life, there are instances

subtitles.original: パッと思い出してしまうような、そんな瞬間が彼女のこう魅力の中にあるんじゃないかなっていうことでですね、
subtitles.english: where you are just suddenly brought back and just suddenly remember.

subtitles.original: パッと、一瞬フッと、その瞬間に戻ってしまえるような、そんな楽しい曲になっておるかと、
subtitles.english: Her ability to make people feel that is one of her strong points I feel. Suddenly, in one moment,

subtitles.original: 思われますので、ぜひ皆さん聴いてみてください。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: in that instance you remember the song. That fun type of song

subtitles.original: 思われますので、ぜひ皆さん聴いてみてください。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: is what I think we were able to make,

subtitles.original: ぜひ皆さん聴いてみてください。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: so everyone be sure to listen to it!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, PES-san! Another one of my big dreams has come true.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, PES-san! Another one of my big dreams has come true.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys loop the song lots and enjoy the super cute animated music video.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys loop the song lots and enjoy the super cute animated music video.

subtitles.original: It really encapsulates my love for Japanese rap, and I hope those feelings come through to all of you when you listen.
subtitles.english: It really encapsulates my love for Japanese rap, and I hope those feelings come through to all of you when you listen.

subtitles.original: Thanks again for tuning in, everyone! Keep enjoying J-Rap.
subtitles.english: Thanks again for tuning in, everyone! Keep enjoying J-Rap.

subtitles.original: Keep enjoying Mori. Keep enjoying things that make you happy.
subtitles.english: Keep enjoying Mori. Keep enjoying things that make you happy.

subtitles.original: Catch you on the flip side, and hopefully at the premiere and member's encore. Peace!
subtitles.english: Catch you on the flip side, and hopefully at the premiere and member's encore. Peace!
